name: v0.99.1
body:
1478
2410
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazeldnf", version = "0.99.1")
```

This will register a prebuilt bazeldnf

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "03852830a239efaa7ee4ba7d50344b2bfd5b41c604e379011bcadf0477ecc8db",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-v0.99.1",
    url = "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/releases/download/v0.99.1/bazeldnf-v0.99.1.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@bazeldnf//bazeldnf:repositories.bzl",
    "bazeldnf_dependencies",
)

bazeldnf_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* Prepare for bzlmod by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/73
* Adjust release script to write the correct deps by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/74
* ci: improve setup by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/76
* Adding linters to CI by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/78
* Adopt bzlmod to build the repository by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/77
* Remove unused RPMReader method by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/79
* deps: bumps all golang deps by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/87
* Make sat reproducible by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/86
* Refactor reducer to enable testing by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/85
* reducer: Add tests for reducer and loader by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/90
* Add priority option for repo configuration by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/84
* General improvements by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/92
* Fix name collision with tar2files command by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/83
* Remove CI for bazel 5.x by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/93
* Add support for generating lockfiles to rpmtree by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/80
* Add allow-list support to resolve and rpmtree by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/81
* Minor refactorings to consolidate common patterns by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/94
* Allow us to ignore missing packages when resolving by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/95
* Add SHA512 and SHA1 support for downloaded files by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/97
* Clean up use of WORKSPACE.bzlmod so we can move fully to bzlmod by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/98
* Add lockfile command to bazeldnf by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/101
* Enable bazel 8 support by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/99
* Steps needed to release to BCR by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/103
* Remove unused build_deps.bzl by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/104
* bzlmod: make sure to chroot under bazel run by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/106
* wrapper: make the wrapper a bit more portable by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/108
* Add .netrc support by @mkosiba in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/82
* Small tweaks to `bazeldnf resolve` command by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/107
* Don't ignore repo if arch is empty by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/110
* Provide tooling for updating lockfiles by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/109
* ci: adding job for issue with fedora 41 repos by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/105
* Lock file bzlmod extension by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/111
* Handle failure modes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/113
* several small fixes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/115
* Use integrity instead of sha256 for RPMs by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/117
* Calculate path to repofile correctly by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/118
* Add null repository rule for missing RPMs by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/119
* Watch the lock file by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/120
* Enable use of architecture for config extension by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/121
* Improvements for cli by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/122
* Several small non related fixes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/127
* rpm: stop calling things downloaded by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/126
* chore: bump dependencies by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/125
* Fix paths to repo.yaml and lockfile by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/129
* Make fetch-repo and update-lock-file publically visible by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/132
* Xz format by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/133
* Fix issues on bazeldnf and xattr rule invocations by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/135
* Add auth_patterns support to RPM rule by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/128
* Make xattr more flexible on different tar formats by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/137
* Retry failed HTTP requests by @wade-arista in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/138
* Support params file for tar2files command by @ramakrishnan-arista in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/139
* Allow tar2files to use an empty prefix by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/140
* Do proper path join for strip_prefix by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/141

## New Contributors
* @kellyma2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/79
* @mkosiba made their first contribution in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/82
* @wade-arista made their first contribution in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/138
* @ramakrishnan-arista made their first contribution in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/139

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/compare/v0.5.9...v0.99.1

name: v0.7.0-alpha3
body:
1433
2410
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazeldnf", version = "0.7.0-alpha3")
```

This will register a prebuilt bazeldnf

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "4c79df93508c99974d9ac7c5c74b5a48d2b4f30983c245fd7adbef367cdfd319",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-v0.7.0-alpha3",
    url = "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/releases/download/v0.7.0-alpha3/bazeldnf-v0.7.0-alpha3.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@bazeldnf//bazeldnf:repositories.bzl",
    "bazeldnf_dependencies",
)

bazeldnf_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* Enable bazel 8 support by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/99
* Steps needed to release to BCR by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/103
* Remove unused build_deps.bzl by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/104
* bzlmod: make sure to chroot under bazel run by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/106
* wrapper: make the wrapper a bit more portable by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/108
* Add .netrc support by @mkosiba in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/82
* Small tweaks to `bazeldnf resolve` command by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/107
* Don't ignore repo if arch is empty by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/110
* Provide tooling for updating lockfiles by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/109
* ci: adding job for issue with fedora 41 repos by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/105
* Lock file bzlmod extension by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/111
* Handle failure modes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/113
* several small fixes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/115
* Use integrity instead of sha256 for RPMs by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/117
* Calculate path to repofile correctly by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/118
* Add null repository rule for missing RPMs by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/119
* Watch the lock file by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/120
* Enable use of architecture for config extension by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/121
* Improvements for cli by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/122
* Several small non related fixes by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/127
* rpm: stop calling things downloaded by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/126
* chore: bump dependencies by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/125
* Fix paths to repo.yaml and lockfile by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/129
* Make fetch-repo and update-lock-file publically visible by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/132
* Xz format by @kellyma2 in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/133
* Fix issues on bazeldnf and xattr rule invocations by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/135
* Add auth_patterns support to RPM rule by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/128
* Make xattr more flexible on different tar formats by @rmohr in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/137

## New Contributors
* @mkosiba made their first contribution in https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/82

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/compare/v0.7.0-alpha1...v0.7.0-alpha3

name: v0.5.6
body:
* Switch bazeldnf to prebuilt binaries, removing all golang dependencies on adopting projects which use bazeldnf through their WORKSPACE file.

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "9dfd5ab882cae4ff9e2a7c1352c05949fa0c175af6b4103b19db48657e6da8b8",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/releases/download/v0.5.6/bazeldnf-v0.5.6.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@bazeldnf//:deps.bzl", "bazeldnf_dependencies")

bazeldnf_dependencies()
```

name: v0.5.5
body:
* Write hard links in a deterministic order (#38)
* Make it more clear that bazeldnf uses the apache2 license (#31)
* Escape download URLs properly to avoid creating invalid WORKSPACE files (#39)
* Bump all bazeldnf dependencies (#36)
* Internal refactoring: don't use deprecated shorthands for binaries in the source code (#37)

Thanks a lot to all contributors!


```
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "bb4210a87f3f2006edb90fbade6df682979dc0330565f2550373f3eb012d928b",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-0.5.5",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/archive/v0.5.5.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

name: v0.5.4
body:
* Improve package name sanitizing: https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/pull/25

```
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "404fc34e6bd3b568a7ca6fbcde70267d43830d0171d3192e3ecd83c14c320cfc",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-0.5.4",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/archive/v0.5.4.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

name: v0.5.3
body:
User visible changes:

* [Protect against pre bash 4.4 bug] #18 
* Fix usage of bash arrays in the ldd command #21 
* Look for libraries in /usr/lib in addition to /usr/lib64 when resolving shared library dependencies #22 

To use the latest release add this to your `WORKSPACE` file:
```
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "dcb8e0ffcfb7a35c077214597f4038210590e99834f783ff8eb2450f8cf9b35c",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-0.5.3",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/archive/v0.5.3.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

name: v0.5.2
body:
* Support two new capabilities #17 

To use the latest release add this to your WORKSPACE file:

```
http_archive(
    name = "bazeldnf",
    sha256 = "c37709d05ad7eae4d32d7a525f098fd026483ada5e11cdf84d47028222796605",
    strip_prefix = "bazeldnf-0.5.2",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/archive/v0.5.2.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

name: v0.5.1
body: * Report errors on hard link properly.

name: v0.5.0
body: Add `xattr` command which allows modifying selinux labels and capabilities directly on tars.

name: v0.4.0
body:
* Remove hardcoded "fedora" values
* [fix] Include `ld-` shared libarries in the `ldd` command
* Add a `sandbox` command
* [fix] Properly add transitive dependencies to the `bazeldnf` rule

name: v0.3.1
body: Ignore ld-* libraries in the `ldd` command.

name: v0.3.0
body:
* Support ignoring packages and its dependencies via a new `--force-ignore-with-dependencies` commandline flag
* Print a more helpful installation summary to better discover what gets installed

name: v0.2.0
body:
* Basic CentOS 8 Strem support
* Switch to MAXSAT which makes `--nobest` prefer newest packages
* Fix a bug where pinned versions were not kept as pinned and we still tried to install the newest version

name: v0.1.0
body: [fix]  Set symlink body size to 0: https://github.com/rmohr/bazeldnf/commit/875e0b4f03897f3f39e3c5c0c3a5d68126c2d1a1, fixes `docker save` issues.
